articles.title: Markets dive as war in Europe looms - The Telegraph
articles.description: Markets went into retreat on multiple fronts on Monday, as the rising drumbeat of war in Europe gave pace to a rout in US technology stocks and compounded fears that the longest bull run in history is finally ending.

articles.title: US places up to 8,500 troops on alert for possible deployment to Eastern Europe amid Russia tensions - CNN

articles.title: The Surface Duo is finally getting Android 11 - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft has begun to roll out Android 11 for unlocked Surface Duos in North America and Europe. The company said in 2021 that it was working to release the update by the end of the year, but it missed that target.
